body: Most players know me and I have been playing on this server for months now, unfortunately, it is time to say goodbye. You see, Avicore isn't really my thing anymore, I don't like how some people are rude and this server hasn't really much improved in my opinion. Some staff members don't really give players chances and don't always answer any questions, and it gets quite dangerous because of the arguing and the swearing. I am leaving permanently, goodbye my friends, I have found another server that is better than this (no offence). One more thing, I do not want to hear players saying "NO!!! DON'T LEAVE!!!" or "Yes!!! mooncat69's left, best day ever!!!" I have made up my mind and it will make me worse if you keep rubbing it in. Bye! :(
body_tagged: Most players know me and I have been playing on this server for months now, unfortunately, it is time to say goodbye. replies.body:
But really mooncat, if you're leaving, leave.
Don't come and bump your topic. It's just not right, and it's to draw attention. 
Spend your last hours wisely doing good things and giving the community support.
Go out with a bang.
